safetyTips: I recommend that after receiving the masks you leave them for a minimum of 48hours before wearing (as they will have already been packaged and in the  post for at least 24 hours).
name: SARAH SEWS
description: Handmade 100% cotton, lined, adjustable, shaped, washable face coverings. Very comfortable to wear while shopping, on public transport or in any enclosed area. Selection of patterns and colours. Delivered by post, I send them out daily Monday to Friday. £4.50 per mask £1.50 postage and packing up to 6 masks. I accept PayPal. Any profit from sales will go to the Royal Marsden head and neck unit. Order via Email or Facebook.
